name: house_with_no_exit
description:
house_with_no_exit is a short experience inspired by my experience with depression. Seeking out things that could scare me in an attempt to feel afraid. 

Content Warning: Load noises, depression themes, claustrophobia, agoraphobia.

Big thanks to Caleb Seymour for providing the music

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Tab to invert mouse
